repair() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.Brick
This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose.
repair() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.CementBrick
This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose by re adding the ball face or the image ball face if it used to have one.
If the crack exists on the brick,it will also be removed.
It resets the broken status to false and allowable strokes to 3.
repair() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.ClayBrick
This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose by re adding the ball face or the image ball face if it used to have one.
It resets the broken status to false and allowable strokes to 3.
repair() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.SteelBrick
This function helps repair the brick for replaying purpose by re adding the ball face or the image ball face if it used to have one.
It resets the broken status to false and allowable strokes to 3.
reset() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.Crack
This function resets the crack by making a new one.
ResetBall(MouseEvent) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PowerUpController
This function allows the player to choose whether to reset the ball or not.
It contains the changing for button's style.
resetBallCount() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.World
This function resets the player's life
resetInitial() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.World
This function sets the world to the one that the user choose.
It also makes all things start from stretch, such as the ball count and ball position.
resetM_GameChecker(GameStatusModel) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.WorldController
This function reset the current gameStatus to be a new one since it may need updates.
It is used by the some functions in the pause menu and power up menu pane.
resetSpeed() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Views.BallView
This function resets the moving speed of ball.
resetStatus(World) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PowerUpController
This function resets game status checker boarder.
RestartButtonOnClicked() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PauseMenuController
This function allows the player to come back to the current game setting with game restarted.
